措.definition: to handle; to manage; to put in order; to arrange; to administer; to execute; to take action on; to plan

措勤.definition: Coqen county in Ngari prefecture, Tibet, Tibetan: Mtsho chen rdzong

措勤縣.definition: Coqen county in Ngari prefecture, Tibet, Tibetan: Mtsho chen rdzong

措手.definition: to deal with; to manage; to proceed

措手不及.definition: no time to deal with it (idiom); caught unprepared

措詞.definition: wording; way of expressing something; turn of phrase; diction

措辭.definition: wording; way of expressing something; turn of phrase; diction
